title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Finals Games 1+ 2 Recap and Game 3 Preview with Marcus Thompson
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Finals Games 1+ 2 Recap and Game 3 Preview with Marcus Thompson
description:
First, (3:00) Colin explains why the NBA Finals ratings have dipped, how Adam Silver should tweak the schedule, and how the Celtics and Warriors resemble the Patriots dynasty.

Then, The Athletic Bay Area columnist Marcus Thompson, and Colin discuss their takeaways from Games 1 and 2 (14:00), how Steph Curry has been so effective (21:00), how the former NBA fathers of Finals players have rubbed off on their sons (25:00), if the Warriors would drastically re-shape their roster with a Finals loss (30:00), how KD would process another Warriors title (33:00), what they expect in Game 3 (40:00), how his relationship with Steph and Draymond differ (43:00).

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
